ygData.subject: RE: [eqenchanters] I'm makin fireworks, I finally got my Froglok  Ton Totem!
ygData.msgSnippet: I did the quest for my enchanter and two of his enchanter friends. Every ton drops a totem. Easiest way, is get a tracker. Find the iksar bandit camp close to
ygData.messageBody:
I did the quest for my enchanter and two of his enchanter friends. Every ton
drops a totem.

Easiest way, is get a tracker. Find the iksar bandit camp close to the
middle of the zone. There are some huts and a large pillar there. Kill
everything in that area and a ton will pop before too long.

We got three ton warriors in 30 minutes there. Not a problem.

-Leod

-----Original Message-----
From: Shawn Alley [mailto:shawna@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 12:29 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqenchanters] I'm makin fireworks, I finally got my
Froglok Ton Totem!


congrats! I have the other 3 pieces (like many people I'm sure).
Approximately how many ton warriors did you have to kill for the totem to
drop? And did you find them only in the city in Swamp of no hope?

Use caution when turning in your items. There is more than one kind of
shaman powder. Probably if you use identify it will say "Nok Shaman
Powder". I mention this as a friend has two "shaman powder" items, one
black the other white. I have only black powder which came from a Nok
Shaman so I believe black is the correct one.

Azara Sparklemeister
20th Enchanter, Povar

Shawn A.

-----Original Message-----
From: Garett [mailto:osmosis@...]
Sent: Thursday, May 11, 2000 9:58 AM
To: eqenchanters@egroups.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] I'm makin fireworks, I finally got my Froglok
Ton Totem!


To those still looking, you have my sympathies.

Cogg
